articles.title: Injury-hit Bristol Bears to send SOS to Nathan Hughes - Bristol Live
articles.description: Pat Lam is facing a fresh injury crisis in the backrow after a bruising defeat to Harlequins
articles.content:
Pat Lam looks set to bring Nathan Hughes back to Bristol Bears early to ease the injury situation in his backrow.

articles.author: Matt Chivers
articles.title: Shane Lowry hits HOLE-IN-ONE on 17th hole at Players Championship - Golfmagic.com
articles.description: Shane Lowry created incredible scenes on the famous 17th hole on Sunday, making an ace on the treacherous par-3 at TPC Sawgrass.
articles.content:
Shane Lowry has done it. Shane Lowry has made an incredible hole-in-one on the 17th hole on Sunday at The Players Championship.
